Content.Text:
<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
So I wasn't dreaming what just happened, right?
You really did confess to me? For real?
<PAGE>
You're not going to take it back or anything,
right?!

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
<WINDOW_HEART2_R>WOO-HOOOOOO!! It's not a dream! Oh! Just to
be sure, <MYNAME>, could you pinch my cheek
for me?
<PAGE>
<ACTION_RIBBON><FACE_ANGRY>AUGH! Never mind! Who cares if it's a dream or
not?! If it is, I'm never waking up! <MYNAME>, I
love you too!

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Oh, hey! I know! Since we're dating and all now,
how about we give each other cute new
nicknames! Wouldn't that be fun? ♪
<PAGE>
You can call me Fritzie-poo or Darling or
Honeybunch or whatever you want!
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>But first, what do you want me to call you?
Let's keep things as they are.
Let's see...

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
So you want me to call you <BLUE><MYNAME></BLUE> now?
Yes

<CANCEL_SELECT>
No

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Gotcha! Man, I'm really looking forward to this,
<MYNAME>!

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Heck, why waste time? Let's go on a date right
n--
<PAGE>
<FACE_SAD>GAH! That's right! I've got stuff to do. Maaaan, I
don't wanna...but I'd better head home and do it
anyway.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>Next time, though! Next time, I swear we'll go on
the awesomest date ever! Okay? Okay! See ya,
<MYNAME>!

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
To be honest, I never expected to hear you
confess to me, <MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
Are you sure it's me you want? Someone like
you could have your pick of all of the bachelors
in town.
<PAGE>
Wouldn't you want someone more, er...your
age?

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
<WINDOW_PALPITATION_R>All right, all right! I yield. I surrender. I'm sorry to
be evasive with you.
<PAGE>
<ACTION_RIBBON><MYNAME>, I love you as well. I will gladly
accept your ring.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Well then, since this is a special occasion, what
say we give ourselves new nicknames to denote
our new relationship?
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>Personally, I'd rather stay away from anything
tasteless or overly formal. I'd be happy if you
simply called me Klaus.
<PAGE>
I won't force anything on you, though. First,
what would you like me to call you?
Let's keep it the same.
I wanna change my name.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You are all right with me calling you
<BLUE><MYNAME></BLUE>?
Yes

<CANCEL_SELECT>
No

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
<MYNAME> it is, then. I am very much looking
forward to taking our relationship another step
forward.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Now then, I would love nothing more than to
stay and carry on with you, but I'm afraid I must
attend to business.
<PAGE>
I will have to be going, then. I'll see you later,
<MYNAME>.

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Well, drat. You beat me to it, <MYNAME>. I was
planning on asking you out myself, I just hadn't
quite worked up the courage to do it yet.
<PAGE>
It's funny. You seem to live such a relaxed,
slow-paced life, yet...you can be rather quick on
the draw when you want to be!

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<WINDOW_PALPITATION_R>Hey, hey! We were in the middle of a
conversation, you know.
<PAGE>
Ah, well. I love that part of you just as much as
any other!
<PAGE>
<ACTION_RIBBON>At any rate, yes. Of course I'll accept your ring!
Let's take our relationship to the next level.

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
...Since this is a big occasion and all, how
about we give ourselves new nicknames? You
can call me whatever you want. I won't mind.
<PAGE>
Now, the question is, what shall I call you?
Same as ever works for me.
Let's see...

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
So, <BLUE><MYNAME></BLUE>, then?
Yes

<CANCEL_SELECT>
No

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Got it. I'm really looking forward to this,
<MYNAME>!

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Now, I'd love to hang out and chat with you for
a while longer, but I've got things to take care
of.
<PAGE>
So I'm afraid I'll need to get going. But I will
most assuredly see you soon, <MYNAME>!

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Goodness. You never cease to find new ways to
surprise me.
<PAGE>
You do realize that, by giving this to me, you
agree to become mine.
<PAGE>
And in return, I will become yours.
<PAGE>
You were, I assume, aware of that before you
asked this of me, no?

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
<WINDOW_PALPITATION_R>Hee hee... I see. Well, as long as you're aware of
the "fine print," so to speak, then I've no reason
in the world to turn down your proposal.
<PAGE>
Though I must admit, I had no intention of
humoring any notions you may have had to
reconsider.

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<ACTION_RIBBON>We are hereby officially lovers. I will never let
you go now, even if you want me to. That, my
dear, is how this works.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>Ah, I know! As this is a special occasion,
perhaps we should give one another new
nicknames.
<PAGE>
I'm sure that will help the reality of this
wonderful new arrangement sink in all the faster.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>What would you like me to call you? Have you
anything in particular in mind?
Let's keep it the same as always.
Let's see...

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
So, <BLUE><MYNAME></BLUE>, then?
Yes

<CANCEL_SELECT>
No

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
All right. From now on, I will call you
<MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
Goodness. I must admit, using our lovers'
names deliberately like this does feel a
bit...ticklish. But I can't deny it's a good feeling.

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Oh, drat! Look at the time. There are duties I
must attend to, I'm afraid.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>I'd much rather stay with you right now,
but...such is life. I will see you later,
<MYNAME>!

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
<MYNAME>? Are you, uh... Are you serious
about this?
<PAGE>
I'm sure you know this already, but I really don't
like jokes.
<PAGE>
If you meant it, then...would you mind showing
me that ring again?

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
<WINDOW_PALPITATION_R>Okay. So you are serious.
<PAGE>
My answer? You should know that already.
<PAGE>
Huh? You want me to say it out loud?! But...but
I... *sigh* Fine. If you insist. Sheesh!
<PAGE>
<ACTION_RIBBON>I, uh... I love you, too. There! You happy now?

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
Huh? Nicknames? What about 'em?
<PAGE>
Well, whatever. If you want to change what we
call each other, that's fine by me.
<PAGE>
Just don't make it anything weird, okay?
Let's just keep it the same.
Let's see...

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You're okay with <BLUE><MYNAME></BLUE>?
Yes

<CANCEL_SELECT>
No

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Okay. <MYNAME> it is.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>I, uh... I'm looking forward to us being,
um...you know...
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>Man, I'm really not cut out for this kind of thing!

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
Anyways, I've got to get going. See ya,
<MYNAME>!

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
<MYNAME>, about that ring and what you said
earlier...Are you sure I'm the one you want?
<PAGE>
I mean, this is all so sudden, I'm still not sure if
I'm just dreaming it all.

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
<WINDOW_PALPITATION_R>Ah. Thanks. Good to know you mean it.
<PAGE>
<ACTION_RIBBON>I, um...I'm in love with you, too. So, ah...I'd be
overjoyed to be your boyfriend.

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, I know! Since this is a big event for both of
us, how about we give each other new
nicknames to commemorate it?
<PAGE>
You can call me whatever you'd like. I don't
mind.
<PAGE>
What would you like me to call you?
Let's keep it the same.
I wanna change my name.

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You want me to call you <BLUE><MYNAME></BLUE>, then?
Yes

<CANCEL_SELECT>
No

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
Okay. So, um...<MYNAME>...I'm really honored
that you told me you loved me. I love you, too,
and I'll never get tired of saying it.
<PAGE>
I'll take good care of you, I promise.

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
Umm...oh yeah. I've got stuff I need to get done
first, though, so I'd better get going.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>See you later, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
So. You're telling me that you are head over
heels in love with me and cannot bear to live
without me, and you wish to be my boyfriend.
<PAGE>
Is that correct?

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
<WINDOW_HEART2_R>"Yep?" Just "yep?" How about a little bit of
bashful blushing and stammering?!
<PAGE>
Honestly, am I the only one to feel
so...enthralled and exhilarated about all this?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>Ahem! Very well. If you insist, I suppose I can
accept your ring. You should be honored that I
am!
<PAGE>
<ACTION_RIBBON><FACE_LOVE><MYNAME>...Thank you.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
There. Now the two of us are officially a couple.
Hm...though even saying it aloud doesn't make it
feel any more real.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>Oh, I know! Let's give ourselves new nicknames.
I will be gracious and listen to what suggestions
you may have.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>Now then, what would you like for me to call
you?
Let's keep it the same.
I wanna change my name.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
So you prefer <BLUE><MYNAME></BLUE>?
Yes

<CANCEL_SELECT>
No

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
All right. <MYNAME> it is.
<PAGE>
As we are now a couple, I will expect you to
treat me even more wonderfully than you have
been.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>I, too, will treat you even more preciously, so
that you can fall even more deeply in love with
me.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
N-now! I have much to attend to, so I must be
going!
<PAGE>
Have a wonderful day, <MYNAME>!

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Never in my wildest imagination did I think
someday I might get a ring from you,
<MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
You pull so many crazy stunts, I'm never sure if
you're serious or just spontaneous.
<PAGE>
<MYNAME>...? Are you, ah...sure I'm the one
you want?

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
<WINDOW_PALPITATION_R>To be honest, I've done some hard thinking of
my own...
<PAGE>
But when you showed that ring to me, any
doubts I had all vanished in an instant.
<PAGE>
<ACTION_RIBBON>If you're sure you want to choose me, then I will
gladly accept this ring.

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
I'm already looking forward to exploring this new
relationship with you.
<PAGE>
Oh, I know. Why don't we give ourselves new
nicknames?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>You and I are partners now. I like the idea of
calling you by a new, special name that's just
between us.
Let's keep it the same.
I wanna change my name.

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You'd like me to call you <BLUE><MYNAME></BLUE>?
Yes

<CANCEL_SELECT>
No

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
<MYNAME>. Hee hee! I must admit, I feel a little
giddy, saying that name out loud.

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh goodness, look at the time. I'm so sorry, I
need to get back home.
<PAGE>
Let's be sure to set aside some time for a proper
date in the near future, though. I can hardly
wait. See you later.

<FACE_LILIE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Um...<MYNAME>? That ring you showed me...
<PAGE>
Does that mean what I think it means? That you
want to, um...g-go out with me?

<FACE_LILIE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
<WINDOW_HEART2_R>Ohmigosh, yay! I'm so happy! You wouldn't
believe how happy this makes me! Thank you,
thank you, thank you <MYNAME>!
<PAGE>
<ACTION_RIBBON>See, um...I-I've really l-...l-liked you for a long
time now, too.

<FACE_LILIE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
So, uh...now that we're dating, what do we do
next?
<PAGE>
Maybe we could, um, give ourselves nicknames
or something. Although that could be kinda
embarrassing... What do you think?
Let's keep our names the same.
I wanna change my name.

<FACE_LILIE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
So <BLUE><MYNAME></BLUE>, then?
Yes

<CANCEL_SELECT>
No

<FACE_LILIE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Okay. ...<MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>W-wow. Deliberately saying out loud that we're
b-boyfriend and girlfriend is kinda...kinda...

<FACE_LILIE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
I-I just remembered! I, um, left the teapot on!
I've got to hurry home right now! I'm sorry!!

<FACE_MENOU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
<WINDOW_HEART2_R>I... I never, ever expected you would be the one
to confess to me, <MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
I'm so happy right now, I don't think I'll be able
to get a wink of sleep tonight!
<PAGE>
Could you, um...show me the ring again,
please?

<FACE_MENOU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
<WINDOW_HEART2_R>Hee hee hee hee! I'm really, really, super-duper
happy right now! <RED>∀</RED>
<PAGE>
I love you lots and lots too, <MYNAME>!
<PAGE>
<ACTION_RIBBON><FACE_LOVE>And, um, I would be very honored if we could
go out together. As... As a couple.

<FACE_MENOU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
Oh, I know! Since this is a super special
occasion, why don't we give each other new,
cute nicknames to commemorate it?
<PAGE>
I'd be really happy with whatever you want to
call me.
<PAGE>
Do you have a special nickname you'd like me to
call you, though?
Let's just stick with what works!
Let's see...

<FACE_MENOU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You want me to call you <BLUE><MYNAME></BLUE>?
Yes

<CANCEL_SELECT>
No

<FACE_MENOU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
All right. From now on, I'll call you <MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
Heh. No matter what name you go by, you're still
my love, and that just makes me so giddy to
think about!

<FACE_MENOU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
...Uh-oh! Is it this late already?!
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>I want to stay here and talk with you more, but I
have other things I need to do.
<PAGE>
I'm sorry, but I'm going to have to go home for
today.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>Come and visit me whenever you want, though,
okay? And I'll come visit you, too! ♪

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Goodness! Sometimes I can hardly believe you.
Bringing all this up out of the blue... It's entirely
too sudden!
<PAGE>
I-I would have liked some time to prepare...

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
<WINDOW_PALPITATION_R>Honestly, you can be so impatient sometimes.
...All right. If you insist, here's my answer...
<PAGE>
<ACTION_RIBBON>If you're sure you want to give that ring to me,
then I will gladly accept it.

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Although, to be frank, I don't have the first clue
how to BE someone's girlfriend.
<PAGE>
Hmm... Well, I guess we could try...giving
ourselves new nicknames, hmm? Anything
you'd like me to call you?
Let's keep it the same.
I wanna change my name.

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You'd like me to call you <BLUE><MYNAME></BLUE>, now?
Yes

<CANCEL_SELECT>
No

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
All right. From now on, I will call you
<MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>My. Knowing you're my boyfriend, saying your
name out loud like that feels...strange.

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Now then, I have to take care of a few things, so
I must excuse myself.
<PAGE>
...I might stumble a bit at the start of all this,
but please bear with me. Whatever's in store for
us, I'm looking forward to it.

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<WINDOW_PALPITATION_R>Er...<MYNAME>? A-are you sure you want to be
giving that...that ring...to me?

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
<WINDOW_PALPITATION_R><ACTION_RIBBON>Thank you. To be honest, I have l-...liked you for
quite some time now.

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
Hm? Now that we're together, you want to,
maybe...give each other nicknames? Is that
something couples do? I have no idea...
<PAGE>
But if you'd like to do that, it'd be fine with me...
Let's keep our names the same.
I wanna change my name.

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
So you want me to call you <BLUE><MYNAME></BLUE> now?
Yes

<CANCEL_SELECT>
No

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
All right. ...<MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>I, er...I'm looking forward to exploring this new
relationship with you.

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
But for now, I'm afraid I need to go home and
return to my studies. See you later, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
So you want to leave it as-is, then?

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
You'd rather leave your name unchanged?

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
So you want it to stay the same?

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
So you would like for it to remain the same?

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
You're okay with leaving it as it is?

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
You want to leave it the same?

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
You'd prefer not to have a nickname?

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
No "nom de plume" for you, hmm?

<FACE_LILIE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
No nickname?

<FACE_MENOU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
So you want me to leave it as-is?

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
You'd prefer to leave your name the same?

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
You just want your regular name?
